Title: Relates to medical debt
Summary: Prohibits money judgments arising from non-payment of facility items and services by a patient or patient guarantor that is brought by a facility; prohibits the enforcement of arbitration agreements or clauses with respect to non-payment of facility items and services by a patient or patient guarantor; relates to the collection of medical debt; requires transparency in hospital pricing.
LawCode: Amd §§5201 & 7501, CPLR; amd §601, Gen Bus L; add §2832, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, the general business law and the public health law, in relation to medical debt
